We decided that we will now have general discussion from 6-7 pm, a DISCUSSION TOPIC (related to a current event or a common issue) in MANDARIN at 7 pm, and response (in Mandarin) to the Mandarin presentation.

The schedule:
6:00 - 7:00 pm - General Discussion - BOTH Mandarin & English
7:00 - 7:30 pm - FOCUSED DISCUSSION TOPIC
(talk IN MANDARIN by knowledgeable person) - maybe some English phrases


Local Boston Attorney George Chiu (of this meetup) will give the 20 November presentation - IN MANDARIN - on "The Fiscal Cliff" - how it affects the USA, China, and the global economy.General discussion in Mandarin will follow George's talk.

7:30 - 8:00 pm - Mandarin discussion of Mandarin talk
The TUESDAY evening event is ALWAYS in the Longwood Medical Area, Boston, MA 02115 (near Mission Hill).

Eat beforehand or bring your food, and it's OK to be late.

If there are questions, (a) read the posting and (b) call ME on my GoogleVoice (617-615-9672).
